body_html:
@gchanan It seems that building on Windows with NO_CUDA=1 gives the following error:

tensor_new.obj : error LNK2001: unresolved external symbol "void __cdecl torch::cuda::lazy_init(void)" (?lazy_init@cuda@torch@@YAXXZ)
01:27:46 build\lib.win-amd64-3.6\torch\_C.cp36-win_amd64.pyd : fatal error LNK1120: 1 unresolved externals

Do you know what should be the fix to this problem?

body:
@gchanan It seems that building on Windows with NO_CUDA=1 gives the following error: 
```
tensor_new.obj : error LNK2001: unresolved external symbol "void __cdecl torch::cuda::lazy_init(void)" (?lazy_init@cuda@torch@@YAXXZ)
01:27:46 build\lib.win-amd64-3.6\torch\_C.cp36-win_amd64.pyd : fatal error LNK1120: 1 unresolved externals
```
Do you know what should be the fix to this problem?
